entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
